title: Best Bets from Vegas with R.J. White (Football 8/28)
description:
It's SportsLine day so Will Brinson and R.J. White break down the latest news on Jadeveon Clowney potentially being traded and then take a look at R.J.'s power ratings before diving into the bets he made out in Vegas over the weekend.
Go to SportsLine.com/join and use the promo code TROPHY to get your first month for $1. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
